title: LeBlanc's new "E" (Ethereal Chains) is using the old visuals
body:
Right now, on the live servers, LeBlanc's E looks like this:

http://i.imgur.com/EkLpyXM.png

But with the update, LeBlanc's E now looks like this:

http://i.imgur.com/g8kktLR.png

While the chain particle itself is new, shiny, and up-to-date, the _ends_ of her E chain are still using the old visuals, as illustrated by the red circle in the image above--it seems to be a bundle of random black/yellow spikes that don't really convey "ethereality" but more something that is physical/tangible. These black/yellow spikes appear unfitting for the ability and should be removed or replaced, IMO, by something that is not only higher quality but also flows better with the new chain VFX.

If anyone could leave this feedback on my behalf in the PBE thread titled ["[Assassins] Artistic Feedback Thread"](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/U6gAHgZu-assassins-artistic-feedback-thread)--I'd really appreciate it, as I don't own a PBE account myself but want to make sure Riot is aware of this!

replies.body:
Heyo Valor Bot!

It was intended to be kept from the old visuals. I hear your feedback that it does not fit the new visuals. I'd love to hear any suggestions you have on how you imagined the leading edge of the chain to look that would better fit LB :D

Hey Phoenix, thanks for the reply!

I think LeBlanc's default "E" VFX would look best if it were similar to Ravenborn's, where the chain has a glowy/transparent pointed edge that's brighter than the rest of the projectile:

http://i.imgur.com/KacY8j6.png

Something along these lines would fit the "ethereal" aspect of the spell better, IMO ^^
I think just adding a glow to the end would be good no?
What about a rose flourish to go along with the black rose?
It may be old and rough, but it's way better than the old chain itself. Ew, it looked like a cobweb spit.
